remarks: Dropping a nested antecedent.  This theorem is one of two reversions of ~ ja .  Since ~ ja is reversible, a nested (chain of) implication(s) is just a packed notation of two or more theorems/hypotheses with a common consequent. ~ axc5c7 is an instance of this idea.  (Contributed by Wolf Lammen, 20-Sep-2013.)  (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
wl-jarri.1 $e |- ( ( ph -> ps ) -> ch ) $.
wl-jarri $p |- ( ps -> ch ) $.
